column4: help me, please. Brother wants to kick me out of his room, therefore I need this wifi stick enabled, seriously XD
It worked last time, somebody helped me, I remember. But I installed 12.10 from the zero, and I dont remember how was my problem last time solved
all ive ever had to do was plug in a wire the first time, run that restricted-extras tool and let it instll the needed drivers.
now a days i got a usb-wifi dongle thats fully supported by ubuntu out of the box. ;) i use it the first time to get the 2nd one going.
